dialog_lines.line: You can positively affect the crew's morale in 3 ways: passively, while working, and by getting their attention.
Your passive morale aura is the yellow ring that just appeared around you. It is usually enough to keep the crew around you working, assuming no negative events are happening.
Your working morale aura is a pulse that gives an additional positive effect on crew morale in range. This will usually restore crew morale while active.
When you get a crew member's attention, they instantly jump to 100% morale. It's motivating to get direct orders from the captain!
Ok, go get their attention now.
